name: The Neon Hook
description:
In this puzzle game you must throw your hook in order to pull and connect floating platforms and use them to exit the room via portal.

Controls via Keyboard and Mouse:
W/S/A/D or Arrows - move
Space - connect/disconnect platforms
Q - move camera back
Esc - pause menu

Controls via Gamepad (xbox):
Left Stick or D-Pad - move
A - connect/disconnect platforms
Y - move camera back
Options - pause menu

Game made with love by zompi for Lost Relic Games Game Jam 2022.

Assets used:
Music: www.purple-planet.com
Sounds: www.freesound.org
Particles: Advanced Magic FX 13
Font: www.dafont.com
